snippet.title: Tales Up : The New Role-Playing Games | Official Trailer [English] | Périple Studio
snippet.description:
Choose wisely, because the adventure starts now! 
Tales Up gives you and your friends control over your own destiny. You decide the path to take, whether or not to trust that beggar woman claiming to see the future, and even who among you will be sacrificed if the situation gets out of hand...

With over twenty role-playing games available, Tales Up covers a wide range of themes. From battling zombies to sailing the high seas as pirates, immersing yourself in Greek mythology or even exploring outer space, every player can find a topic that interests them.

PLAY AT TALES UP :
Website : https://talesup.io
App Store : https://apps.apple.com/fr/app/tales-up/id1533630240
Google Play Store : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.talesupreader&hl=fr

Soon on steam → https://store.steampowered.com/app/2543210/Tales_Up/

FOLLOW TALES UP :
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/tales.up.en/
Twitter : https://twitter.com/tales_up_EN
Discord : https://discord.gg/yeJ7UsWGY4
